verses.verse: And I, brethren, <S%G80><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> not speak <S%G2980><s%> to you as to spiritual <S%G4152><s%> men, <S%G4152><s%> but as to men <S%G4560><s%> of flesh, <S%G4560><s%> as to babes <S%G3516><s%> in Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I gave <S%G4222><s%> you milk <S%G1051><s%> to drink, <S%G4222><s%> not solid food; <S%G1033><s%> for you were not yet <S%G3768><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> [to receive it.] Indeed, <S%G235><s%> even <S%G3761><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> you are not yet <S%G2089><s%> able, <S%G1410><s%>

for you are still <S%G2089><s%> fleshly. <S%G4559><s%> For since <S%G3699><s%> there is jealousy <S%G2205><s%> and strife <S%G2054><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, are you not fleshly, <S%G4559><s%> and are you not walking <S%G4043><s%> like <S%G2596><s%> mere men <S%G444><s%>?

For when <S%G3752><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> of Paul, <S%G3972><s%>" and another, <S%G2087><s%> "I am of Apollos, <S%G625><s%>" are you not [mere] men <S%G444><s%>?

What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is Apollos <S%G625><s%>? And what <S%G5101><s%> is Paul <S%G3972><s%>? Servants <S%G1249><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you believed, <S%G4100><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as the Lord <S%G2962><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> [opportunity] to each <S%G1538><s%> one. <S%G1538><s%>
I planted, <S%G5452><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> watered, <S%G4222><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> was causing <S%G837><s%> the growth. <S%G837><s%>

So <S%G5620><s%> then <S%G5620><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> the one who plants <S%G5452><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> the one who waters <S%G4222><s%> is anything, <S%G5100><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> who causes <S%G837><s%> the growth. <S%G837><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> he who plants <S%G5452><s%> and he who waters <S%G4222><s%> are one; <S%G1520><s%> but each <S%G1538><s%> will receive <S%G2983><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his own <S%G2398><s%> labor. <S%G2873><s%>
For we are God's fellow <S%G4904><s%> workers; <S%G4904><s%> you are God's field, <S%G1091><s%> God's building. <S%G3619><s%>

According <S%G2596><s%> to the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which was given <S%G1325><s%> to me, as a wise <S%G4680><s%> master <S%G753><s%> builder <S%G753><s%> I laid <S%G5087><s%> a foundation, <S%G2310><s%> and another <S%G243><s%> is building <S%G2026><s%> upon it. But let each <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G1538><s%> be careful <S%G991><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he builds <S%G2026><s%> upon it.

For no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> lay <S%G5087><s%> a foundation <S%G2310><s%> other <S%G243><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the one which is laid, <S%G2749><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> builds <S%G2026><s%> upon the foundation <S%G2310><s%> with gold, <S%G5553><s%> silver, <S%G694><s%> precious <S%G5093><s%> stones, <S%G3037><s%> wood, <S%G3586><s%> hay, <S%G5528><s%> straw, <S%G2562><s%>

each <S%G1538><s%> man's work <S%G2041><s%> will become <S%G1096><s%> evident; <S%G5318><s%> for the day <S%G2250><s%> will show <S%G1213><s%> it, because <S%G3754><s%> it is [to be] revealed <S%G601><s%> with fire; <S%G4442><s%> and the fire <S%G4442><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> will test <S%G1381><s%> the quality <S%G3697><s%> of each <S%G1538><s%> man's work. <S%G2041><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man's work <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has built <S%G2026><s%> upon it remains, <S%G3306><s%> he shall receive <S%G2983><s%> a reward. <S%G3408><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man's work <S%G2041><s%> is burned <S%G2618><s%> up, he shall suffer <S%G2210><s%> loss; <S%G2210><s%> but he himself <S%G846><s%> shall be saved, <S%G4982><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> as through <S%G1223><s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>
Do you not know <S%G3609><s%> that you are a temple <S%G3485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and [that] the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> dwells <S%G3611><s%> in you?

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> destroys <S%G5351><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will destroy <S%G5351><s%> him, for the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is holy, <S%G40><s%> and that is what <S%G3748><s%> you are.

Let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G1818><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you thinks <S%G1380><s%> that he is wise <S%G4680><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> age, <S%G165><s%> let him become <S%G1096><s%> foolish <S%G3474><s%> that he may become <S%G1096><s%> wise. <S%G4680><s%>

For the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> is foolishness <S%G3472><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "[He is] the one who catches <S%G1405><s%> the wise <S%G4680><s%> in their craftiness <S%G3834><s%>";
and again, <S%G3825><s%> "The Lord <S%G2962><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> the reasonings <S%G1261><s%> of the wise, <S%G4680><s%> that they are useless. <S%G3152><s%>"
So <S%G5620><s%> then <S%G5620><s%> let no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> boast <S%G2744><s%> in men. <S%G444><s%> For all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> belong <S%G1510><s%> to you,

whether <S%G1535><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> Cephas <S%G2786><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> things <S%G1764><s%> present <S%G1764><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> things <S%G3195><s%> to come; <S%G3195><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> belong to you,
and you belong to Christ; <S%G5547><s%> and Christ <S%G5547><s%> belongs to God. <S%G2316><s%>
